skins.shipDescription: Illustrious-class aircraft carrier ¨C Illustrious, Hull Number 87.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the world's first armoured aircraft carrier, ehehe. One day, I'll do my best for the glory of the Royal Navy!
skins.acquisition: Good day to you, Commander. I am Illustrious of the Royal Navy. We'll spread the holy light of love and peace all across the ocean, right~?
skins.login: Good day, Commander. I helped organize a little bit based upon how you had things before. How does everything look?
skins.details: Illustrious is steady in her steps!
skins.secretaryIdle1: My planes? They're right here. Ehehe, everyone's so well-behaved.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I'll be there for you any time you're feeling lonely.
skins.secretaryIdle3: What an even more wonderful world it would be if everyone could understand each other.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander's hand is so big... much bigger than mine...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Is this some sort of new game...?
